m_szDocTitle: Cleantech Cars At The 2015 Los Angeles Auto Show | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Cleantech Cars At The 2015 Los Angeles Auto Show November 23rd, 2015 by Kyle Field   The Los Angeles Auto Show is always a huge event, and with California being the #1 state in the US for EV sales — with only 13% of the total car sales but 40% of all EV sales — we were looking for big news from the show this year. The show did not disappoint, bringing new-to-North America concepts, “green car” test drives, and the announcement of the winner of the 2016 Green Car of the Year award , among other things.
